mapper.select: Select ClientID as ID,Name from tbClient Where ClientID!=#{ID} And ClientID in(Select ClientID from(select a.ClientID,a.SignMan from tbClient a left join (select ClientID from FollowRecord where ClientID>0) b on a.ClientID=b.ClientID) vt where dbo.fn_auth_client_signman(#{UserID},#{RoleName},#{DepID},SignMan)=1) Order by CreateTime Desc
SELECT * from View_ClientDaiMoney Where ClientID=${ClientID} Order by CreateTime desc
Select * from View_ClientGuanMoney Where ClientID=${ClientID} Order by CreateTime desc
Select top 1 * from tbClient Where Name=#{name}

Select '0' as PID,'X'+convert(varchar,ClientID) as FID,convert(varchar,ClientID) as Code,Name,null as Email from tbClient Where 1=1 And ClientID in(Select Distinct ClientID from tbClientLinkers)
and dbo.fn_auth_client_signman(#{UserID},#{RoleName},#{DepID},SignMan)=1
Union Select 'X'+convert(varchar,a.ClientID) as PID,convert(varchar,LinkID) as FID, a.LinkMan as Code,a.Mobile as Name,a.Email from tbClientLinkers a inner join tbClient b on a.ClientID=b.ClientID Where 1=1
and dbo.fn_auth_client_signman(#{UserID},#{RoleName},#{DepID},b.SignMan)=1
